product_name: Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle Keychain - Large
long_description: This large Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle keychain lets out a loud and shrill blast that is sure to attract attention when you need it. Whistle is made from colorful anodized aluminum and measures 2.75 in. in length. Attached to a split key ring. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: This large Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle keychain lets out a loud and shrill blast that is sure to attract attention when you need it.
